BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SOUTH DAKOTA

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE SOCIAL SERVICES FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES, RACES, FAITHS, & ECONOMIC LEVELS IN SD.
IRS990.MissionDesc: INSPIRED BY GOD'S LOVE, WE CARE FOR, SUPPORT, AND STRENGTHEN INDIVIDUALS, FAMILIES AND COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.Desc: CHILDREN & YOUTH SERVICES - SERVICES PROVIDED FOR CHILDREN AND YOUTH INCLUDED RESIDENTIAL AND AFTER-CARE SERVICES FOR AT-RISK YOUTH, AND FOSTER CARE. 3,696 PEOPLE SERVED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COUNSELING AND COMMUNITY SERVICES - MENTAL HEALTH COUNSELING SERVICES WERE PROVIDED THROUGH INDIVIDUAL, COUPLES, FAMILY, AND GROUP COUNSELING SETTINGS, AS WELL AS IN RESPONSE TO DISASTERS. FINANCIAL RESOURCES SERVICES PROVIDED FINANCIAL COUNSELING, DEBT MANAGEMENT SERVICES, FINANCIAL EDUCATION, FORECLOSURE MITIGATION, HOUSING COUNSELING, AND BANKRUPTCY COUNSELING AND EDUCATION. OTHER SERVICES PROVIDED INCLUDED CHILDCARE SERVICES, MENTORING, INDEPENDENT LIVING, AND ADOPTION. 18,024 PEOPLE SERVED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: NEW AMERICAN PROGRAMS - REFUGEES AND IMMIGRANTS RECEIVED A VARIETY OF SERVICES TO HELP THEM MAKE A SUCCESSFUL TRANSITION TO A NEW CULTURE AND BECOME SELF-SUFFICIENT. 75 REFUGEES RESETTLED. 119 SECONDARY MIGRANTS ASSISTED. 958 IMMIGRATION COUNSELING HOURS. 280 EDUCATION STUDENTS. 4,024 INTERPRETER HOURS PROVIDED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONSUMER CREDIT COUNSELING IS A SERVICE OFFERED BY LSS FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING FINANCIAL COUNSELING AND DEBT MANAGEMENT SERVICES. THESE FUNDS ARE HELD ON BEHALF OF CLIENTS FOR REMISSION TO THEIR CREDITORS. DISASTER SERVICES ARE PROVIDED BY LSS. IN SOME INSTANCES, THERE IS NOT A LOCAL ORGANIZATION ABLE TO HANDLE FUNDS THAT HAVE BEEN RAISED FOR DISASTER RESPONSE.
ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE HELD BY LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SOUTH DAKOTA FOUNDATION. FUNDS DISTRIBUTED FROM THE ENDOWMENT ARE USED TO SUPPORT PROGRAMS OF LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES.

THE ENTITY BELIEVES THAT IT HAS APPROPRIATE SUPPORT FOR ANY TAX POSITIONS TAKEN AFFECTING ITS ANNUAL FILING REQUIREMENTS, AND AS SUCH, DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ENTITY WOULD RECOGNIZE FUTURE ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES RELATED TO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AND LIABILITIES IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE IF SUCH INTEREST AND PENALTIES ARE INCURRED.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SD FOUNDATION

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: FUNDING FOR LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SOUTH DAKOTA FOUNDATION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SOUTH DAKOTA DONATES FUNDS TO ITS RELATED ORGANIZATION, LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SOUTH DAKOTA FOUNDATION. THE EXECUTIVE LEADERSHIP DIRECTS THE FUNDS, AND ENSURES THAT THEY ARE USED ACCORDING TO THE INTENT OF LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SOUTH DAKOTA.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: CONSTRUCTION OF CENTER FOR CHILDREN AND YOUTH

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AMOUNT IN COLUMN B REFERS TO THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS AN EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE COMMITTEE INCLUDES THE ELECTED OFFICERS OF THE BOARD AND AT LEAST TWO OTHER DIRECTORS. EACH MEMBER SHALL BE REPRESENTED ON THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE COMMITTEE IS EMPOWERED TO ADMINISTER THE AFFAIRS OF THE CORPORATION BETWEEN MEETINGS, TO THE EXTENT AUTHORIZED BY THE BOARD. THE COMMITTEE SHALL EVALUATE THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AT LEAST ONCE EACH YEAR. MEETINGS OF THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE SHALL BE CALLED BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION UPDATED ITS BYLAWS TO INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING: LSS EMPLOYEES AND/OR RELATIVES ARE PROHIBITED FROM SERVING AS BOARD MEMBERS. OFFICERS CAN SERVE A MAXIMUM OF THREE SUCCESSIVE TERMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MEMBERS OF THE CORPORATION ARE THE COOPERATING LUTHERAN CHURCH JURISDICTIONAL UNITS WHICH PRESENTLY ARE THE SD SYNOD OF THE EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH OF AMERICA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOUTH DAKOTA SYNOD OF THE EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH ELECTS EIGHT DIRECTORS. OF THESE EIGHT DIRECTORS, THE BISHOP SHALL BE ONE DIRECTOR AND SEVEN DIRECTORS SHALL BE ELECTED FROM EACH OF THE SEVEN CONFERENCES, ONE FROM EACH CONFERENCE. DIRECTORS SHALL BE ELECTED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AT THE ANNUAL MEETINGS OF THE MEMBERS. REMAINING DIRECTORS SHALL BE ELECTED BY THE BOARD OF THE DIRECTORS OF LSSSD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS OF THE ORGANIZATION ADOPT AMENDMENTS TO THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION AND BYLAWS AND APPROVE NEW MEMBERS OF THE CORPORATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE GOVERNING BODY ELECTRONICALLY AT LEAST ONE WEEK PRIOR TO FILING AND IS REVIEWED IN DETAIL BY THE TOP FINANCIAL OFFICIALS OF LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEETING BEGINS WITH THE PRESENTATION OF AN AGENDA AND UPON REVIEW OF THIS AGENDA THE MEMBERS ARE ASKED TO DISCLOSE ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. ALSO, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS AND TRUSTEES COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST ANNUAL DISCLOSURE. MONITORING AND COMPLIANCE IS DONE BY HAVING THE EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT TRACK RECEIPT OF THE FORMS THAT ARE COMPLETED AND FOLLOW-UP WITH ANY BOARD MEMBER(S) THAT HAS NOT SUBMITTED A FORM. THE FORMS ARE REVIEWED BY THE PRESIDENT AND ANY QUESTIONABLE DISCLOSURES ARE REFERRED TO THE BOARD CHAIR FOR FINAL DETERMINATION. IF A CONFLICT IS IDENTIFIED THE MEMBER WOULD ABSTAIN FROM VOTING, BUT POLICY DOES ALLOW THEM TO STATE THEIR POSITION AND ANSWER PERTINENT QUESTIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BASED ON COMPARABLE COMPENSATION LEVELS OF OTHER LSS ENTITIES AND SIMILAR NONPROFIT AGENCIES IN THE GEOGRAPHIC AREA. THE COMPENSATION LEVEL IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED ANNUALLY. THE VICE PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE PRESIDENT BASED ON PERFORMANCE, COST OF LIVING, AVAILABILITY OF BUDGETED FUNDS, ETC. IT IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY USING THE SALARY COMPENSATION POLICY OF THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

LUTHERAN HOUSING CORPORATION PRAIRIE LAKE APARTMENTS
